name: S'more to Explore
description:
''There is s'more to explore, man!'' Story- Once upon a time, there was a marshmallow named Marsh. He lived in a bag of marshmallows with all his friends. They were all the same size and shape, and they were all happy together. One day, however, Marsh found himself falling out of the bag and into a strange machine. He soon realized that he had fallen into a Gravitron. The machine was filled with different chambers and tunnels that used the mechanics of gravity to move things around. Marsh was scared and alone, but he knew he had to find a way to escape the Gravitron and reunite with his marshmallow friends. He started to navigate through the chambers, using the pull of gravity to move him forward. Navigate Marsh through the deadliest of mazes and platforms by using gravity to help him get out of the Gravitron to reunite with friends!.. Controls- 1-Arrow keys/ WASD to move  2-Space to jump  3-Touch the portal to get to the next level  4-Avoid spikes/ acid Credits
  1. Thanks to FinesseArt for making the art for this project.
  2. Coding by Metroid Games
  3. YouTube for the Victory Music
  4. This game is a recreation of the popular online game, That Gravity Game. Check out the OG game below: http://www.notdoppler.com/thatgravitygame.php. All rights go to Juice-Tin for his original Flash game.
  5. Music composed by OverDrive and VodMusic

A Metroid Games Production made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Run Jam

Important Details-

How does your game implement the focus, Run? -

The game is a platformer which means when Marsh is controlled, he begins running........

Did you credit all assets in-game (including your own) as required by the rules?

Not in-game, but on the game page

Will we work more on the project? - Yes. We are aiming for a commercial release with a sequel in planning.

What tools did your team use to construct the game? - 

We used the following tools-

  1. Ms-Paint and Sketch for the Art.
  2. JavaScript and Kaboom for the Coding.
  3. Beepbox for making the music. 

Which art and audio did you / your team NOT create?- 

We did not create the victory music since we were on a time crunch. We used the music we found on YouTube. We are finding the creator of the track......

Diversifiers Implemented-

Old Music - The music team has composed a newer composition of the soundtrack from the original game 'That Gravity Game'.

Hidden Secrets -There is a hidden secret Illuminati Collectable found across levels

Members Involved- 1. CoderBroDev (Metroid Games)-Programming 2.FinesseArt-Art 3.OverDrive-Music 4.VodMusic-Music
